doc:
James Gleason https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/James_Gleason 0 For the politician, see James P. Gleason. Not to be confused with people named James Gleeson.James Austin Gleason (May 23, 1882 – April 12, 1959) was an American actor born in New York City. He was also a playwright and screenwriter. For the_politician , see James_P._Gleason . Not to_be_confused with people named James_Gleeson.James_Austin_Gleason ( May_23_,_1882 – April_12_,_1959_) was an_American_actor born in New_York_City . He was also a_playwright_and_screenwriter .
